entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
